name: Flappy Candy vs. Bird
description:
Help Gummy down the cliff ... Watch out for the birds !!! Collect the trophies, compare yourself with the other players ...

Move from left to right to avoid the rocks.
Throw bombs on the ugly birds.
Collect the bonus boxes.

-Try to beat your score and that of your friends
-Selling the best in the GameCenter LeaderBoard
-Easy to play and totally FREE
-Recover the trophies of Bronze, Silver, Gold and Emerald.

A very addictive game!

Have fun!
